com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.queryprofile

Interface QueryProfileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryProfileServiceImpl

    public interface QueryProfileService
    Service for manipulating HP Haven OnDemand Query Profiles

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(TokenProxy tokenProxy, String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(String name)
      Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfileStatusResponse deleteQueryProfile(TokenProxy tokenProxy, String name)
      Delete an existing query profile in HP Haven OnDemand using the given token
      QueryProfiles listQueryProfiles()
      Deprecated. 
      Use ResourcesService.list(ListResourcesRequestBuilder) and use ResourceType.query_profile as the resource type
      QueryProfiles listQueryProfiles(TokenProxy tokenProxy)
      Deprecated. 
      Use ResourcesService.list(ListResourcesRequestBuilder) and use ResourceType.query_profile as the resource type
      QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(String name)
      Retrieves a query profile using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
      QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(TokenProxy tokenProxy, String name)
      Retrieves a query profile using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
      QueryProfileStatusResponse updateQueryProfile(TokenProxy tokenProxy, String name, String queryManipulationIndex, QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
      Update a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService

    • Method Detail

      • createQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(String name,
                                            String queryManipulationIndex,
                                            QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the query profile
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • createQueryProfile

        QueryProfileStatusResponse createQueryProfile(TokenProxy tokenProxy,
                                            String name,
                                            String queryManipulationIndex,
                                            QueryProfileRequestBuilder params)
                                              throws HodErrorException
        Create a query profile in HP Haven OnDemand for a specified query manipulation index using the given token proxy
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        name - The name of the query profile
        params - Configuration parameters for the query profile
        Returns:
        The name of the created query profile
        Throws:
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
        HodErrorException

      • retrieveQueryProfile

        QueryProfile retrieveQueryProfile(String name)
                                  throws HodErrorException
        Retrieves a query profile using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the query profile
        Returns:
        The query profile
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired

        name - The name of the query profile
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • listQueryProfiles

        @Deprecated
QueryProfiles listQueryProfiles()
                                throws HodErrorException
        Deprecated. Use ResourcesService.list(ListResourcesRequestBuilder) and use ResourceType.query_profile as the resource type
        Gets the names of the query profiles that currently exist using a token proxy provided by a TokenProxyService
        Returns:
        A QueryProfiles response object, that has a util method on it for getting the actual names.
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        NullPointerException - If a TokenProxyService has not been defined
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired

      • listQueryProfiles

        @Deprecated
QueryProfiles listQueryProfiles(TokenProxy tokenProxy)
                                throws HodErrorException
        Deprecated. Use ResourcesService.list(ListResourcesRequestBuilder) and use ResourceType.query_profile as the resource type
        Gets the names of the query profiles that currently exist using the given token
        Parameters:
        tokenProxy - The token proxy to use
        Returns:
        A QueryProfiles response object, that has a util method on it for getting the actual names.
        Throws:
        HodErrorException
        HodAuthenticationFailedException - If the token associated with the token proxy has expired
